data.captions:
High volume density doesn’t mean higher value—especially in scrap logistics.

In Munich, one of our customers faced this exact issue: hot forming automotive scrap was too thin yet too bulky for efficient handling. Then came Zato Blue Devil—the twin-shaft shredder that downsizes and densifies light steel scrap, optimizes container loads, and reduces logistics costs.

The result? Greater efficiency, lower costs, less waste. Watch the shredder in action and see the difference!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment #MetalRecycling #BlueDevil

Busheling nearing closer to $500/ton riding the wave as most metals are pushing higher on demand hopes. 

Maybe it’s time to think about how your yard is processing busheling. 

This is Zato most popular application in the US and for good reason. 

Skeleton plates, production clips, coils, tubes, racking, fencing bundles, and lots of other clean iron products fly through our Blue Devil twin shaft. 

With a production cost of only $11/ton and throughput up to 30 tons per hour, this machine is the answer to your question. 

“How can we grow this year?”

Put down a concrete pad and we can install in two weeks. 

#scrap #zato #shredder #busheling #recycling #metals

This is one of the nightmares of hammer mill operators: in Spanish it is called "maraña": tangled wire rod that jams the rotor, blocking the hammers and clogging the grids;

One of the ways of processing such material is to let it be devoured by the Zato Blue Devil: the final size is so beautiful that it is no longer necessary to pass it through the hammer mill: maximising the yield by simply "thinking differently"...

More and more companies are embracing circular economy principles, transforming scrap into valuable resources. Latin America’s metal recycling industry is following this path, driving demand for efficient, high-performance solutions.

For businesses seeking reliable partners in waste management, Zato brings over 25 years of expertise in designing and manufacturing hammermills, pre-shredders, scrap shears and scrap cleaning plants for ferrous and non-ferrous metals.

Meet our experts at stand 1718 to explore smarter, more efficient metal recycling solutions.

It's been a busy start to the year for us at Zato and recycling as a whole. 

Two weeks ago, the S&P Global Aluminum Symposium was held in Florida where manufacturers and recyclers alike took part in a massive industry update. 

The most widely held sentiment: the US needs more secondary aluminum smelting.

Arconic expects AI infrastructure for water, energy, and grid maintenance to be a bolstering point for recycled aluminum. Military AND space exploration to be another demand sector.

Alcoa says that with Alumina prices at all time highs, aluminum actually has more demand and is going to benefit.

Bank of America charts show aluminum supply growth has waned the last 4 years while demand for aluminum products has grown significantly. 

Why does this matter to recyclers?

Similar to ferrous markets recently, as melt shops expand into more local US markets, they will need clean, sized, sorted material. Mixed aluminum and non-ferrous goods may keep you alive, but refined, specific grades keeps you growing.

Our job at Zato is easy, keep supplying customers with equipment to create liberated, sized material for sorting. Low quality in, high quality out, under one roof.

Blue Devil Twin Shaft Shredder: debales and pre-shreds full size aluminum scrap.

Blue Marlin Single Shaft Shredder: downsizes extrusions and profiles to screen and sort.

Blue Shark Compact Hammermill: shreds any aluminum material to a uniform size, liberate contaminants, and allow the best sorted product to be made.

Small in size, powerful in performance!

The Blue Shark 12.10 FP combines compactness, reliability, and exceptional efficiency to revolutionise metal recycling. Designed for shredding ferrous and nonferrous materials, it delivers high-purity outputs while ensuring ease of use, low maintenance, and superior durability.

Looking for a smarter, more efficient recycling solution? Discover more about our hammer mill at https://lnkd.in/eyd-ysfE

Shredding hazardous materials such as fire extinguishers and previously bonified gas tanks is no easy task. The risks of explosions and equipment damage can disrupt operations and inflate costs.

All these problems can be solved by switching to the Blue Devil shredder. The result? Enhanced safety, reliable hammer mill protection, and improved operational efficiency.

Learn more by watching the full video!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingSolutions #TwinShaftShredder #BlueDevil

Safety and efficiency go hand in hand with Zato’s Blue Devil pre-shredder.

Designed to act as a ‘Guardian Angel’, the Blue Devil reduces explosion risks caused by, previously bonified, gas tanks ensuring a safe working environment. Its open design handles dangerous items without damage, minimising downtime and protecting your team and profits.

Invest in safety and performance—discover more about Zato’s Blue Devil.

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingSolutions #TwinShaftShredder #BlueDevil

Your biggest investment is likely not living up to it’s full potential. 

Hammermills are revolutionary to metal recyclers, transforming you from a collection point to a recycling site. 

But is there more you can get out of your hammermill? 
- YES!

4 of our newest customers allowed us to gather data before and after the installation of a Zato Blue Devil. 

Not only was production nearly doubled at every site, but downtime decreased dramatically. 

Why?

It’s pretty simple - bulky material into a shredder is like eating a full head of lettuce, sure you could do it. 

But if you chopped it up into smaller pieces, you could do it a lot faster and without hurting yourself. 

Its the same idea with shred feed. Not only are the pieces smaller, you also remove pressurized containers, or unshreddables.  

Recycle safer. Recycle better. 

Recycled Materials Association (ReMA) Recycling Today #scrap #shredder #zato #steelYour biggest investment is likely not living up to it’s full potential.

Big moves don’t happen without blood, sweat, and years of hustle. Standing here in front of our new Zato BlueDevil shredder, I can’t help but think about all the people who made this happen.

This isn’t just a machine—it’s a symbol of countless late nights, tough decisions, and relentless hard work by every single person on our team. It’s proof that when you grind together, you grow together.

But don’t get it twisted—we’re far from done. This is just the next step in our journey, and we’re coming for more. Let’s keep building, keep hustling, and keep proving that nothing’s out of reach. 🔥🔧⚙️

Blue Devil available for install as soon as next week! 

Our latest installation of a Zato slow speed rotary shear is testing out some different applications. 

With tires, the main draw is increasing density to lower shipping costs. A truck packed full of shredded tires is beating the weight on a truck of full size tires everyday. 

Same business case for stainless steel, shredded iron, aluminum, and many other materials. 
#scrap #tires #shredder #zato

Busheling. Light iron. White goods. Breakage. Car bodies. Pre-shredding. Cast and Sheet Aluminum. Heavy melt.

Through one machine, our Blue Devil. 

We’ve added lots of new customers in the US🇺🇸 this year. 

We are learning new applications and outlets every month as the market changes. 

And as our product count grows here, so do we. 

Which is why we’ve invested in a new office in Northern Kentucky and grown our employee headcount by 100% this year. 

Zato North America stocks all of our parts and blades here now. 🔩⚙️

Service and support technicians are here year round now. 

I’m looking forward to an exciting end of the year and strong growth going into 2025! 

See you next week at the Shredder Ops Forum in San Antonio! ✌🏼

The ultimate system for precision, durability and efficiency in one shear: Cayman RB!

With its robust frame and high-bore cylinder, it delivers powerful cutting forces, effortlessly processing railway and tramway rails up to 70 kg/m. Equipped with four-profile interchangeable blades and simplified hydraulic rotation, it ensures smooth operation and reduced maintenance.

Turning waste into value starts with the right technology.

White goods are more than discarded appliances—they hold steel, aluminum and copper, important materials ready to be reintroduced into the production cycle. Zato’s solutions help companies do this, optimising every step from safe pre-shredding to precise material separation.

Boost efficiency, reduce waste—choose Zato.

High shredding capacity is just the beginning when processing white goods. Without precise separation, value is left behind.

In Spain, our customer tackled this challenge with Zato’s powerful trio: Blue Devil, Blue Shark, and Blue Sorter. This complete processing line ensures not only optimal size reduction, but also precise recovery of valuable metals from end-of-life appliances.

The result? Cleaner output, higher purity, and greater market value.
Watch the full system in action.
